title: Nerf riven's e
body:
Idk if I sound butthurt which I am a bit but I am just a bit annoyed on how riven's e scales off of ad. This means that she has a shield that is on a low cd and can still have the same amount of damage since her e scales off of ad. I would really appreciate if they either:
a) Make it scale off of ap
b) Make the ratio lower
c) Make the cd higher
Idgaf if you down vote dis, and feel free to bitch about me but this is my opinion and I think this is what should be done.
Discussion below pls :)

replies.body:
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy

They've already addressed this by making her shield have an incredibly low duration. Most of the time it won't even reduce damage, it's so hard to time. It's mainly used for its mobility instead.
